content: fill the world with flowers these little flowers are great for using up scraps of yarn and they re so quick and easy to make it won t take you long to fill the world with dozens of flowers in all colors and sizes i hope you enjoy the pattern skill level beginner materials i ve used a cotton fingering weight yarn scheepjes catona and a 2 5 mm hook feel free to experiment with different yarns and hook sizes abbreviations = standard us crochet terms chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half treble treble_crochet = treble instructions to begin chain 4 join with slip_stitch in first chain to make a ring round 1 chain 1 = first single_crochet 9 single_crochet in ring slip_stitch in first chain or join with invisible join into first single_crochet not the first chain fasten_off 10 single_crochet round 2 join new color in any single_crochet and work chain 2 half_double_crochet treble_crochet in that single_crochet treble_crochet half_double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch in next single_crochet * slip_stitch chain 2 half_double_crochet treble_crochet in next single_crochet treble_crochet half_double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch in next single_crochet* repeat *-* until you have 5 petals fasten_off and weave in ends if you post photos of items made from this pattern to any website or social media please include a link to the original pattern page on ravelry com and credit me as the designer if posting to instagram please tag me @torunjcrochet so that i can admire your work
